trans-unit.source: To implement a security upgrade initiator, inherit from this <see langword="abstract" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: 若要實作安全性升級啟動器，請從這個 <see langword="abstract" /> 基底類別 (Base Class) 繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeAcceptor> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會搭配 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeAcceptor> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeProvider> 使用，以實作自訂資料流升級。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如需升級程序的詳細說明，請參閱 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeInitiator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeInitiator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security message property provided on the stream for performing custom security negotiation based on the information provided in the security context.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料流上所提供的安全性訊息屬性，以便根據安全性內容中所提供的資訊來執行自訂安全性交涉。

trans-unit.source: This information is useful for implementing a stream-level authentication mechanism based on the identities provided in the security context.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊對於根據安全性內容中所提供的身分識別來實作資料流層級的驗證機制非常實用。
